summary: Completed backend testing for Watizat project after OpenAI integration update. All core API endpoints working correctly except AI chat which requires OPENAI_API_KEY configuration.

critical_bugs.issue: Missing OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable causing 500 Internal Server Error
critical_bugs.impact: AI chat functionality completely broken - users cannot get AI assistance
critical_bugs.error_message: The api_key client option must be set either by passing api_key to the client or by setting the OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable
critical_bugs.solution: Add OPENAI_API_KEY to /app/backend/.env file with valid OpenAI API key

passed_tests: GET /api/help-locations/categories - returns categories with proper structure and icons
POST /api/auth/register - successfully registers new users with JWT token
POST /api/auth/login - successfully authenticates users and returns JWT token
Backend server startup without import errors
All non-AI API endpoints responding with correct status codes
action_item_for_main_agent: Add OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable to /app/backend/.env file. The server.py code uses AsyncOpenAI which requires this key. Ask user to provide valid OpenAI API key or use a placeholder/mock for testing.
